Activity: Check emails and review the week's progress. Today's goals: Complete the interactive training module and review all training materials.
Finalize the interactive training module, ensuring all elements are functioning correctly and that the module is engaging and effective.
Thoroughly review the slide presentation, user manual, and interactive training module for accuracy, consistency, and clarity. Make any necessary revisions.

Email @qatest-1, @qatest-2: Request that they test the interactive training module and review the slide presentation for any errors or inconsistencies. Subject: Training Module and Presentation Testing Request.
Lunch break. Relax and unwind before the final push.
Address any feedback received from the quality assurance testers and make necessary revisions to the training materials.
Prepare a final version of all training materials, including the slide presentation, user manual, and interactive training module.

Email @ehrv-1: Ask them to confirm whether the developed training materials align with the EHR system and its updated influenza data collection process. Subject: Align Training Materials with EHR System for Influenza Data Collection.
Document the training development process, including any challenges faced and lessons learned. Store all training materials in a secure and accessible location.
Review the week's accomplishments, update the task list, and respond to any outstanding emails. Celebrate a successful week with colleagues!
